external_games.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Thorns of the Briar Queen

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Thorns of the Briar Queen
summary: Dragged out from her crystal tomb beneath the city of Shadespire, the Briar Queen and her spectral army of geists, and spirits are ready to combat all who trespass in the Mirrored City. Unlock this warband and play as the Thorns of the Briar Queen in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.
